sentences: Normand Corbeil (April 6, 1956 â€“ January 25, 2013) was a Canadian composer known for his work on films, video games and television.
Corbeil won a BAFTA Award and an Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences award for composing the soundtrack for the 2010 PlayStation 3 video game, Heavy Rain.
Corbeil, who was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in August 2012, died on January 25, 2013, at the age of 56.
Beyond: Two Souls (unfinished due to his death; completed by Lorne Balfe; 2013)
